name: I have no idea how anyone that tries to get started with Mastodon and Bluesky using their first-party apps can say "Mastodon is harder to use." If you include third-party apps, I think that's doubly so. It may have been true at some point, but now its just a silly narrative.

content.html: I have no idea how anyone that tries to get started with Mastodon and Bluesky using their first-party apps can say "Mastodon is harder to use." If you include third-party apps, I think that's doubly so. It may have been true at some point, but now its just a silly narrative.
content.value: I have no idea how anyone that tries to get started with Mastodon and Bluesky using their first-party apps can say "Mastodon is harder to use." If you include third-party apps, I think that's doubly so. It may have been true at some point, but now its just a silly narrative.
